Package org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.cypher.capf.query.functions

Functions required for the transformation of graphs to CAPF compatible Flink tables

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EdgeLabelFilter
    Method to filter edge tuples by their labels.
    EdgeToTuple
    MapFunction that maps tuples containing a Long id and an edge to an edge tuple.
    IdOfF1<E extends EPGMElement>
    KeySelector that returns the id of a EPGMElement in the second field of a tuple.
    PropertyEncoder<E extends Element>
    Encodes property types not yet supported by CAPF to a String representation.
    ReplaceSourceId
    Replace the source GradoopId of an edge tuple with the matching Long id;
    ReplaceTargetId
    Replace the source GradoopId of an edge tuple with the matching Long id;
    TupleToRow
    RichMapFunction that maps edge tuples to rows.
    UniqueIdWithOffset<E>
    Zip each element in the dataset with a unique Long id.
    VertexLabelFilter
    Function filters tuples by the label of the EPGMVertex in the second field.
    VertexToRow
    RichMapFunction that maps tuples containing a Long id and an vertex to row.

Package org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.cypher.capf.query.functions Description

Functions required for the transformation of graphs to CAPF compatible Flink tables
